title: T206 Christy Hughie, Tris & Keeler For Sale
author: wrm

posts.post_title: T206 Christy Hughie, Tris & Keeler For Sale
posts.post_content:
Have the following for sale....prices are delivered to you in the USA.

T206 Willie Keeler SGC 1 Principle de gales backing - 250.00 SOLD
T206 Hughie Jennings PSA 3.5 sovereign back - 450.00 pending SOLD
T206 Tris Speaker PSA 1 piedmont 350 back - 550.00
T206 Christy Matthewson PSA no grade, sticker says recoloring - someone wrote on front above cap as shown - 400.00

I have others for sale in the various sections if interested.
Payment can be one of the following....PPFF, check, or postal money order.
If messaging, I will get back, but I check site as often as I can so, please be patient.

Thanks for looking.

Apparently Paypal is giving issue with PPFF...venmo also can be used for those who can.
